com.googlecode.aluminumproject.parsers.aluscript.lines

Class AbstractLineParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.parsers.aluscript.lines.AbstractLineParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommentLineParser, InstructionLineParser, TextLineParser

    public abstract class AbstractLineParser
extends Object
implements LineParser
    Abstract superclass of line parsers.

    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        protected int getLevel(String line)
        Determines the nesting level of a line by counting the number of tab characters at the start of the line.
        Parameters:
        line - the (indented) line to determine the nesting level of
        Returns:
        the nesting level of the given line (>= 0)

      • removeIndentation

        protected String removeIndentation(String indentedLine)
        Removes all leading tab characters from a line.
        Parameters:
        indentedLine - the line to remove indentation from
        Returns:
        the given line without its indentation characters
